attributes.action: Remove from MPs the decision over the West Lothian Question and give it to the people in a referendum
attributes.additional_details: The West Lothian Question should have been resolved years ago but will never be if it is to remain with the ONLY people who benefit if it is never resolved.  The people most adversely affected by politicians' failure to resolve the situation are the taxpayers of this country and it is THEY who should be given the opportunity to resolve the question in a legally binding referendum.  Politicians' are continuously demonstrating an inability to resolve questions which might end up adversely affecting one or more of their membership.  They CANNOT be allowed to proscrastrinate further on a problem which is destroying democracy in this country.
